actions.name: Harry
actions.description: When wielding a Ranged Weapon you may activate this Perk. Create a Harry Clock with 3 Spans. When attacking targets within line of sight and your first RI, your allies can tick the Harry Clock to gain +1 ACC on their attack. The Harry Clock expires when filled, or at the beginning of your next activation.
